mapper.insert: insert into va_plat_acc_info ( acct_id,plat_id,acct_type, acct_no,acct_name,is_this_bank, acct_br_no,acct_br_name,acct_ccy, update_date,update_user,acct_status,acct_category ) values ( #{acct_id},#{plat_id},#{acct_type}, #{acct_no},#{acct_name},#{is_this_bank}, #{acct_br_no},#{acct_br_name},#{acct_ccy}, #{update_date},#{update_user},#{acct_status},#{acct_category} )
